Parameters: int: date bin index as returned by getIndex()

Returns: string label suitable for display to user
Parameters: int: date bin index as returned by getIndex()

Returns: an index from 0 to (DAY_COUNT - 1) that identifies which date bin this date belongs to
Parameters: long: time since the Epoch in milliseconds, such as that returned by Calendar.getTimeInMillis()

ClassDesc: Sorts dates into the following groups: Today Yesterday seven days ago one month ago older than a month ago
